name: Super monkey kong 2016 quest: fun free new jungle adventure game
name_original: Super monkey kong 2016 quest: fun free new jungle adventure game
description:
Play with the beautiful monkey lady and explore a big world of exciting adventure on the jungle, forest, snow, and lava.

And try beat all the big bosses.

Super monkey kong 2016 quest - fun free run & jump jungle adventure game punch big ennemies and collect gorilla banana (Recommended for kids games)

How to play :

- Use the buttons to move the super monkey and jump

- Punch all the ennemies

- Use the super powers and the rocks, bombs and boomerang

- Survive until the doors to get some cool gifts

Please give us your reviews on the game so we can ameliorate it, so you can get the best gaming experience with us

Have fun and thanks for playing.
